about_the_game:
🌵 Yeehaw, Pardner! 🌵

Guntris is a rooting, tooting, fast shooting good time.

Step into the dusty boots of a sharpshooting desperado and dive into the most thrilling Tetris style experience yet. Guntris combines the timeless challenge of Tetris with the heart-pounding action of the Wild West.

🔫 Shoot 'Em Up! 🔫

In Guntris, you don't just place blocks – you blast 'em! Use your trusty six-shooter to clear lines and take down outlaws. Aim true, shoot fast, and watch the pieces fall into place.



🎮 Features:

Low Poly Charm: Immerse yourself in a beautifully crafted, low poly Western world.
High Stakes: Face off against dynamite chucking bandits as you stack your way to victory.
Fast-Paced Action: Quick draw your way with precision and skill.
Epic Showdowns: Down your trusty bottle of Whiskey to slow down time.]

🌟 Why Guntris?

Unique Gameplay: Experience a fresh twist on the classic Tetris formula.
Stunning Visuals: Enjoy a vibrant, stylized Western setting.
Endless Fun: Challenge yourself and friends to beat high scores and become the ultimate Guntris legend.

Lock and Load, Cowboy! 🐎



Are you ready to take on the frontier? Saddle up and download Guntris today for an adventure like no other. The West is waiting – and it's time to show 'em who’s boss!

name: Guntris

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-4340
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Blast your way through a low poly Western world in this thrilling Tetris style adventure. Use your six-shooter to clear lines and outlaws. Enjoy fast-paced action, stunning visuals, and unique gameplay. Saddle up, download Guntris today, and become the ultimate sharpshooting legend! 🌵
